CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total productivity rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Sales Team}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total productivity rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Management Team}.

VE.Q: What is Management Team's Productivity Rate in 2018?
VE.A: Management Team's productivity rate in 2018 is {7.63} units/hour.

VE.A: Sales Team's productivity rate in 2017 is {10.68} units/hour.

VE.A: Human Resources's productivity rate in 2017 is {10.97} units/hour.

VE.Q: What are the productivity rate of Operations Staff, Engineering Department, and Sales Team in 2018?
VE.A: Operations Staff's productivity rate is {10.66} units/hour, Engineering Department's productivity rate is {10.97} units/hour, Sales Team's productivity rate is {11.56} units/hour.

EVJ.A: The global minimum total productivity rate is {56.56} units/hour.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Productivity Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total productivity rate is {59.52} units/hour.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Productivity Rate exceed 59 units/hour? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NF.A: total value was {59.52} units/hour in {2017}, total value was {56.56} units/hour in {2016}, total value was {58.45} units/hour in {2018}.
